name: SEMI Advanced Technology Germany
goal: SEMI is the industry association representing 2000+ companies to advance the technology of electronics manufacturing. SEMI members are responsible for the innovations in materials, design, equipment, software, devices, and services that enable smarter, faster, more powerful, and more affordable electronic products. Since 1970, SEMI has built connections that have helped its members prosper, create new markets, and address common industry challenges together. SEMI maintains offices in Brussels, Berlin, Grenoble, Bangalore, Silicon Valley, Hsinchu, Seoul, Shanghai, Singapore, Tokyo, and Washington, D.C.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Industrial Policy, Innovation Policy, Horizon 2020, Framework Programs, Digital Single Market, Digitizing EU Industry Initiative, Big Data, Internal Market, Energy Union, Trade and Investment, Environmental Issues (REACH, RoHs...), EU Skills Agenda.
